channel.title: Rscx RSC Server - New and Updated
channel.description:
http://rscx.my-rpg.com [size=14pt]Register there and download the client server exp is at 80x [/size]
RSCX Server Status: Online
[img]http://i60.servimg.com/u/f60/13/80/86/06/rscxc210.png[/img]

item.title: Rscx RSC Server - New and Updated
item.dc:creator: @malikz malikz
item.description:
@malikz wrote:

[quote=“Peeter, post:10, topic:333972”][quote author=bonzakid link=topic=430372.msg3160132#msg3160132 date=1269465544]

Lol instead of cracking on things you dont know bout why dont u try it lol its not like noobscape… You sound like the 10 year olds that use to play jagex rsc…lol

I did play it, Soon as I logged in I couldn’t bare to laugh, so I just logged off, and deleted the client from my computer.
Rofl I said “I Ddos” because Kimbo Slice wouldn’t give me admin, and I got banned. I was only joking about the ddos too… “You banned”.
Great staff
[/quote]

I would’ve banned you for that also. Unfunny joke is unfunny.[/quote]

Gay man is gay.

Go spoon with Miles and Ch3rry.

Read full topic

item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

We need more information, I dont want to play from the title saying “New and Updated” and also the picture saying join/vote… thats it? what features have you added? how many players are usually online? etc. etc. Also, why are there two topics for this… against the rules my dearest.
